author: torres
title: Vertra: tokenized properties market
description: How to increase the liquidity of the real estate market through tokenization and create a new form of financing through blockchain.
solution: Vertra is a global real estate marketplace of tokenized properties token holders have access to dividends and tenants to a rent to own model
experience: We developed the platform available on vertraimoveis.com and have over 20 years of experience in the real estate financial market on team.
